scripts.dev: bun run dev:setup && bun run dev:all
scripts.dev:setup: echo 'ðŸ”§ Initial build of shared package...' && cd shared && bun run build
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend" --names "shared,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && echo 'Backend does not need build step'
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd shared && bun install && cd ../backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.clean: bun run clean:shared && bun run clean:frontend
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:shared && bun run type-check:backend && bun run type-check:frontend
